title: My Pixel 4 XL battery percentage is stuck at 50% and will not charge anymore.
content: My Pixel 4 XL will not charge and if I take it off of the charger it crashes. When I finally get it booted back up the battery percentage is stuck at 50%. I have tried to put it on a wireless charger and it seems to do something because it please realign for wireless charging. So it is attempting to charge. I've read through a lot of these forums and it seems that I'm going to have to take my phone to a Ubreak-I fix store because they are partnered with Google. I don't know if they are going to try to replace the battery or tell me what my next step to do...
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
